thread.title: KitchenAid Professional 500 Series Stand Mixer Only $199.99 Shipped (Regularly $499.99)
thread.title_full: KitchenAid Professional 500 Series Stand Mixer Only $199.99 Shipped (Regularly $499.99)

author: Angie (Sweet Sidekick)
title: KitchenAid Professional 500 Series Stand Mixer Only $199.99 Shipped (Regularly $499.99)
text:
Today only, BestBuy.com is offering up this KitchenAid Professional 500 Series Stand Mixer in Empire Red , Silver or Onyx Black for just $199.99 shipped (regularly $499.99).
This heavy-duty 5-quart stand mixer features a bowl-lift design so you can secure the bowl in place and mix heavy batters and large batches with ease. It comes with a Powerknead spiral dough hook, flat beater and stainless steel wire whip.
